subject: Re: spook radio with iron exploring wire to emitter copper(red)exploring wire to base
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I had an AM mode voice using amnual sweep that I haven't had time ot 
copy to the computer yet, that said somehthing like "use a diode to get 
your Lincoln". Back in 2002, I did have Lincoln attempt to speak 
through the box. It was hard to hear, and you could tell he didn't know 
what a mic was. I think I've missed alot by having to focus all my 
attention, and time on building boards, and almost none by comparison 
on sessions.  

 

 Frank
